definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards

sentences.english: He longs for them to adjust their behaviour to reflect the righteousness of Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 他切望他們能夠改正行爲以彰顯出耶穌的公義。

sentences.english: The move star is ambitious of applause.
sentences.chinese: 這位電影明星切望喝彩。

sentences.english: You are waiting with anxious eyes at my door, sleepless and silent.
sentences.chinese: 你帶着切望的眼睛，在門前等我，無眠而靜默。

sentences.english: He desires them to add to the strength of the memory.
sentences.chinese: 他切望他們要加強記憶力。

sentences.english: Yet no faith will the greater part of mankind have, however ardently thou dost desire it.
sentences.chinese: 你雖然切望世人信道，但他們大半是不信道的。

sentences.english: For He desires that none should perish.
sentences.chinese: 因爲祂切望沒有一個滅亡。

sentences.english: Your desire for the thing you wish is perhaps stronger than your desire for the will of God to be fulfilled in its arrival.
sentences.chinese: 你切望得到你所要的欲，也許遠勝過完成神的旨意。

sentences.english: I am eager and wakeful， I am a stranger in a strange land.
sentences.chinese: 我切望而又清醒，我是一個異鄉的異客。

sentences.english: We are anxious to see a return to constitutional forms in peru .
sentences.chinese: 我們切望祕魯恢復憲政形式。

definition: to look forward eagerly to sth/keenly desired
memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father
(courteous) to be so kind as to think of (me)
variant of 紀念|纪念[ji4 nian4]
